name: 1251 - Tuesday
description:
The world is ending, so be prepared! Time is green, the moon is purple, and freedom is red! Hold on to your ears, it might get too loud for you! 

This game has it all: 4:3 aspect ration! Flat-Shaded textures! Mindnumbing sounds! Get ready for the rollercoaster of your lifetime*

*Rollercoaster of your lifetime is a figure of speech. This game does not constitute an actual rollercoaster; however, you might experience slight nausea.
